rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {09-4, 10, 41, 50}
Unit was previously coded {AAF3170, AAF3174, AFC3170%, AFC3174}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {AFC2140, BFB2631, BFC2140, BFF2631, BFG2631, BFP2631, BFW2631} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {AFF2401, AFW2401, BFF2401, BFW2401}

description: Major issues involved in the financial management of banks and other deposit-taking financial institutions. Topics include performance measurement; asset/liability management for liquidity risk, credit risk, interest rate risk; and regulation of depository institutions.
